attributes.action: SACK BOB AINSWORTH FROM THE POST OF THE MINISTER FOR DEFENCE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: HE MUST HAVE KNOWN THAT WHEN THE PRIME MINISTER STOOD UP IN THE HOUSE AND SAID THAT THE TROOPS IN AFGHANISTAN WERE ADEQUATELY EQUIPPED THAT BROWN WAS LYING.HE SHOULD THEREFORE BE SACKED FOR NOT DOING HIS DUTY WHICH IS TO PROTECT THE TROOPS FOR WHOM HE HAS RESPONSIBILITY.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
